scripts.buildWin: rmdir /s /q "build" 2> nul & parcel build ./src/index.pug --out-dir build --public-url ./ --no-minify --no-cache && parcel build ./src/achievements/*.pug ./src/projects/*.pug --out-dir build --public-url ../ --no-minify --no-cache && exit 0
scripts.build: rm -rf build && parcel build ./src/index.pug --out-dir build --public-url ./ --no-minify --no-cache && parcel build ./src/achievements/*.pug ./src/projects/*.pug --out-dir build --public-url ../ --no-minify --no-cache && exit 0
